channel.title: Will someone help me... jesus christ
channel.description:
This is fucking pissing me off. 2 days i've tried!
Base: Devo 2.7 Problem: Can't get castle wars to become wildy? I've got the coords correct and everything, it just won't be come wild!

item.title: Will someone help me... jesus christ
item.dc:creator: @Rage-Pk -Rage-Pk
item.description:
@Rage-Pk wrote:

EDIT - Added coords, still can’t attack.

Read full topic
item.source: Will someone help me... jesus christ

item.title: Will someone help me... jesus christ
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Type is just a small change in the method so there won’t be 3 separate methods for the wilderness. It makes it more clean, you could say.

Try changing } else if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3069) && (coordY <= 3134) && (coordX <= 2432) && (coordX >= 2359)) { return true; }

To

} else if (Type == 3) { if(coordX >= SouthWestXCoord && coordX <= NorthEastXCoord && coordY >= SouthWestYCoord && coordY <= NorthEastYCoord) { return true; }

Do as it states in the code. Switch your coordinates to those. You’ll only need The Southwest and Northeast coords because those coords come together to form a box, which will be the area of castle wars.

Anyways, after adding it yourself, did you apply it to anything else t actually make it work? If it just sits in that method then it won’t be doing anything.

Read full topic
item.source: Will someone help me... jesus christ

item.title: Will someone help me... jesus christ
item.dc:creator: @Rage-Pk -Rage-Pk
item.description:
@Rage-Pk wrote:

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
	if (Type == 1) {
		if ((coordY >= 3520) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
				&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
			return true;
		}
	} else if (Type == 2) {
		if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
				&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
			return true;
		}
	} else if (Type == 1) {
		if ((coordY >= 3069) && (coordY <= 3134) && (coordX <= 2432)
				&& (coordX >= 2359)) {
			return true;
		}
  1. wild
  2. wild
  3. Castle wars (mini game)

Also I don’t know what type does… Couldnt find out

Read full topic
item.source: Will someone help me... jesus christ
